oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of useful benzocyclobutene building blocks via the Suzuki-Miyaura coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
LAHIRI, K
SREENIVASACHARY, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: polymerization
acids
boron
coupling
cycloadditions
polymers
palladium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A general and simple methodology for 3,6-diaryl benzocyclobutene (BCB) derivatives is reported using the Suzuki-Miyaura coupling reaction as a key step. Some of these building blocks are useful for the synthesis of a variety of BCB-based polymers.
